about: Full-Stack web developer with 3 years of experience developing Java web applications (REST API). Former System Engineer in Infosys for a premium US Retail client on implementing their E-Commerce project. Certificate in Full-Stack web development by the University of Washington. Excellent verbal, written, interpersonal, and organizational skills, with the ability to work in large initiatives. A strong sense of focus and excellent attention to detail while working in fast-paced environments with aggressive timelines.
